dimension.description: The namespace and ID of the dimension the player should spawn in.
dimension.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the dimension the player should spawn in.

biome.description: If specified, the player will only spawn in the biome that matches the specified namespace and ID.
biome.markdownDescription: If specified, the player will only spawn in the biome that matches the specified namespace and ID.

structure.description: If specified, the player will only spawn in the specified namespace and ID of the structure. __The structure needs to generate in the specified dimension.__
structure.markdownDescription: If specified, the player will only spawn in the specified namespace and ID of the structure. __The structure needs to generate in the specified dimension.__

spawn_strategy.description: Determines whether the player should spawn near the world spawnpoint (0, 0) of the dimension (`"center"`) or near the coordinates of the Overworld spawnpoint (whilst considering the value of the `dimension_distance_multiplier` field) (`"default"`).
spawn_strategy.markdownDescription: Determines whether the player should spawn near the world spawnpoint (0, 0) of the dimension (`"center"`) or near the coordinates of the Overworld spawnpoint (whilst considering the value of the `dimension_distance_multiplier` field) (`"default"`).

dimension_distance_multiplier.description: Defines the ratio of Overworld blocks to blocks in the specified dimension. e.g: for The Nether dimension, this would be set to `0.125`. __This needs to be set when `spawn_strategy` is set to `"default"`__
dimension_distance_multiplier.markdownDescription: Defines the ratio of Overworld blocks to blocks in the specified dimension. e.g: for The Nether dimension, this would be set to `0.125`. __This needs to be set when `spawn_strategy` is set to `"default"`__

type.description:
## Modify Player Spawn

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn)

Modifies the location of the player's spawnpoint to the specified dimension, biome and/or structure.

Type ID: `origins:modify_player_spawn`




---

### üìù Note

See [Minecraft Wiki: Generated structures (IDs)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn) and [Minecraft Wiki: Biome (Biome IDs)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn) for a list of structure IDs and biome IDs respectively.





---

### üìù Note

Keep in mind that structure location is costly and it might take one or two seconds (or longer) before the player gets teleported when choosing the power.



---

### Examples

```json
{
  "type": "origins:modify_player_spawn",
  "dimension": "minecraft:the_end",
  "structure": "minecraft:end_city",
  "spawn_strategy": "center"
}
```

This example will let players spawn at an End City in The End dimension.

## Modify Player Spawn

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn)

Modifies the location of the player's spawnpoint to the specified dimension, biome and/or structure.

Type ID: `origins:modify_player_spawn`




---

### üìù Note

See [Minecraft Wiki: Generated structures (IDs)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn) and [Minecraft Wiki: Biome (Biome IDs)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_player_spawn) for a list of structure IDs and biome IDs respectively.





---

### üìù Note

Keep in mind that structure location is costly and it might take one or two seconds (or longer) before the player gets teleported when choosing the power.



---

### Examples

```json
{
  "type": "origins:modify_player_spawn",
  "dimension": "minecraft:the_end",
  "structure": "minecraft:end_city",
  "spawn_strategy": "center"
}
```

This example will let players spawn at an End City in The End dimension.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Player Spawn (Power Type) date: 2021-04-06

Modify Player Spawn

Power Type

Modifies the location of the player's spawnpoint to the specified dimension, biome and/or structure.

Type ID: origins:modify_player_spawn

!!! note

See [Minecraft Wiki: Generated structures (IDs)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Generated_structures#ID) and [Minecraft Wiki: Biome (Biome IDs)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Biome#Biome_IDs) for a list of structure IDs and biome IDs respectively.

!!! warning

Keep in mind that structure location is costly and it might take one or two seconds (or longer) before the player gets teleported when choosing the power.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
dimension Identifier The namespace and ID of the dimension the player should spawn in.
biome Identifier optional If specified, the player will only spawn in the biome that matches the specified namespace and ID.
structure Identifier optional If specified, the player will only spawn in the specified namespace and ID of the structure. The structure needs to generate in the specified dimension.
spawn_strategy String "default" Determines whether the player should spawn near the world spawnpoint (0, 0) of the dimension ("center") or near the coordinates of the Overworld spawnpoint (whilst considering the value of the dimension_distance_multiplier field) ("default").
dimension_distance_multiplier Float optional Defines the ratio of Overworld blocks to blocks in the specified dimension. e.g: for The Nether dimension, this would be set to 0.125. This needs to be set when spawn_strategy is set to "default"

Examples

{
  "type": "origins:modify_player_spawn",
  "dimension": "minecraft:the_end",
  "structure": "minecraft:end_city",
  "spawn_strategy": "center"
}

This example will let players spawn at an End City in The End dimension.
